text: looks like gif jank is actually because of a memory leak
i moved the gifs out of raw and into drawable xxxx so that it would be able to auto-resample, which lowered the overall memory overhead, but if you let them run and loop, they leak like crazy
trying to figure that out now
also reminder <!channel> please format your source files so that they lint and align with the proper column count
so it looks like whats happening is that the gifs leak when they’re off screen.
